title: Organizational argumentation competency enhancement training program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic logic and organizational communication experience
context.additional_context: Training structured around real-world logical fallacy cases encountered by practitioners in their daily work.

learning_goals: Learners can identify six types of logical fallacies occurring in organizational argumentation processes with 90% accuracy
Learners can propose at least three appropriate response strategies for situations violating argumentation rules
Learners can write practical documents (reports/proposals) that improve argumentation structures through inductive case analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
